cause.description:
The principle of "Informed Consent" is at the foundation of Canadian Medical Law; it grants every citizen the right to reject invasive medical procedures that may carry unacceptable risks—we believe vaccination is such a procedure. When considering vaccination, we urge you to base your decision on information rather than assumption; please complete your own research before subjecting your child and make a truly informed decision!
1. Vaccinations should be a CHOICE!!!
2. Vaccinations should have a list of ingredients.
3. Vaccination Risks should be made public....very public.
cause.mission: To prevent vaccine injuries and deaths through public education and to defend your right to make an informed and voluntary decision regarding vaccination.
cause.name: Vaccination Awareness
